title: WaveSpeed AI - Effortlessly Remove Backgrounds from Images

hero.description: Eliminate unwanted backgrounds from your images with just a few clicks.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Remove the background from this image.

features.heading: Why Use Our Background Remover?
features.description: Leverage cutting-edge technology for flawless results with simplicity.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Experience lightning-fast background removal in mere seconds.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Just upload your image and let the AI handle the rest—it's that easy.

items.title: Privacy Assured
items.description: Your images are processed directly on your device, ensuring complete privacy.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Transform your images in three easy steps

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or select it from your files. We support various formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Background Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI swiftly identifies and removes backgrounds while preserving the integrity of your photo.

items.title: Download Your Image
items.description: Preview your edited image, make adjustments if necessary, and download it in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join the ranks of delighted users who have transformed their images with our technology

items.name: Jessica Lee
items.comment: I was blown away by how quickly it removed the cluttered background from my product photos!

items.name: David Smith
items.comment: This tool has revolutionized my social media posts. Clean backgrounds make a huge difference.

items.name: Anna Kim
items.comment: Knowing my photos stay on my device while being edited gives me peace of mind. I'm a fan!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about our Background Remover feature

items.title: What types of backgrounds can be removed?
items.description: Our AI can remove complex backgrounds, including landscapes, indoor settings, and solid colors. It's designed to intelligently identify and replace backgrounds without compromising the subject's quality.

items.title: Is using the Background Remover free?
items.description: Absolutely! You have access to 30 free credits each day, enough to modify a large number of images. Additional credits can be earned through activities on our platform.

items.title: Can the resulting images be used commercially?
items.description: Yes, subscribers can use the content commercially, while free users are limited to personal projects. For detailed licensing information, consult our Terms of Service.

items.title: How is my privacy protected during processing?
items.description: All image processing happens locally in your browser, utilizing secure technologies. Your files never leave your device, ensuring maximum privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Images?
footer.description: Try our Background Remover today and discover the ease of enhancing your photos. No signup necessary.
